name: TheDigitalGods
0:
”Alexa, ask the digital gods to bless me.”
”Alexa, ask the digital gods to curse me.”
”Alexa, ask the digital gods for a blessing.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: the digital gods
des: Let the Digital Gods bless or curse you! From high in the clouds they will generate countless curses to hurl your way, and then bless you for asking! This skill generates numerous random blessings or curses based upon your request. Fun for the whole family.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
